Title: Caves of Conduct
Description:
Enjoying the grind too little? Qud too easy to navigate? Feel bad about kithing someone and then mugging them for all they're worth? Try Caves of Conduct - a fully optional way to spice up your runs!

[h2]What does this add?[/h2]
This mod adds a single menu, the Conducts menu. To open it, find "Open Conducts" in Keybinds > Status and bind it to (for example) Ctrl-O.

This menu simply brings up a list of conducts that you can follow, keeping track of which ones you've upheld.

[h2]What are conducts good for?[/h2]
Simply put - they're for bragging rights; they show up in your death menu/tombstone file, proving that you've managed to do things like "make it to the Moon Stair without eating a single bite" or "kill Saad-Amus without ever firing a gun or swinging a weapon." All challenges are optional, but some aren't for the faint of heart...

[h2]Can I add my own Conducts?[/h2]
Of course! When Caves of Conduct is loaded, any mod with a Conducts.xml file will have their own conducts added to the game. (See the given Conducts.xml for details.) Make a conduct for fighting exclusively with a rubber chicken! Prevent yourself from moving except when propelled by explosives! The possibilities are endless!
